DOC.brief_summary: The aim propose study analyze effect incorporation phototherapy therapeutic exercise program pain , functional capacity , range motion , muscle strength individual osteoarthritis knee . The participant allocate different group randomization process use opaque envelope contain card stipulate one three follow group : Group A ( exercise protocol ) ; Group B ( exercise protocol + phototherapy protocol ) ; Group C ( exercise protocol + placebo phototherapy protocol ) . Phototherapy perform knee diagnose osteoarthritis .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Phototherapy Incorporated Into Exercise Program Osteoarthritis Knee
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis osteoarthritis knee ( unilateral ) accord criteria American College Rheumatology age 40 80 year either gender knee pain functional disability least six month confirm historical medical .
